entry.title: OP_CHECKSPVPROOFVERIFY
entry.summary: In an email exchange between Eric Lombrozo and Joseph Poon, Lombrozo suggested that with the Lightning Network (LN), it might be possible to outsource Simplified Payment Verification (SPV) proofs from other nodes. Poon requested more information on the SPV proof opcode, but Lombrozo was unable to provide any links or details on the subject. Poon expressed interest in the potential security benefits of such a system.
